pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1:0.6_0: Ime kho panāyyāyo sekhiyā dhammā uddesaṁ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1:1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessanti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1:1.5_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1:1.6_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1:1.7_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1:1.8_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1:1.11_0: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1:1.13_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1:1.16_0: Yā anādariyaṁ paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambentī nivāseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karonti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:1.5_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:1.6_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā, tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:1.7_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:1.8_0: Atha kho bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:1.12_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karontī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:1.15_0: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:1.17_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:1.18.1_0: “Na udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:1.19_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena gilānā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṁ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:2.3_0: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānāya bhikkhuniyā udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:2.4_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:2.5.1_0: “Na udake agilānā uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:2.6_0: Na udake agilānāya uccāro vā passāvo vā kheḷo vā kātabbo.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk75:2.7_0: Yā anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake agilānā uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
